content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
───────────────────
No new structures have been successfully placed on the map. Multiple attempts were made to locate, craft, and position a Lab at (0.5, 2.5) for research support, but none succeeded due to resource and crafting shortfalls. Although furnace entities (e.g. at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0) and Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0)) were referenced during smelting operations, no new production structures were constructed.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• API Misuse with get_entities  
  – Call get_entities using its correct signature. Avoid including unsupported keywords (such as “radius”) or extra positional arguments.

• Lab Placement and Null Entity Handling  
  – Verify that a Lab is available in the inventory before attempting placement, and ensure that any returned list of lab entities is validated (i.e. not None) before iterating over it.

• Lab Crafting Resource Shortage  
  – Confirm that all required sub-ingredients (for example, iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, and copper-cables) are producible and available. Ensure the production chain (including smelting and intermediate crafting) is sufficient to meet the lab’s recipe requirements.

• Resource Chain Management  
  – Monitor resource counts and adjust smelting or pre-production inputs accordingly, so that all prerequisite components for Lab crafting are reliably obtainable.
